verses.text: \w And|strong="H0559"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0582"\w* cannot \w be|strong="H0582"\w* \w justified|strong="H6663"\w* compared \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

He \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, \w and|strong="H3824"\w* \w mighty|strong="H0533"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*: \w who|strong="H4310"\w* hath resisted \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3824"\w* hath had peace?

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* hath removed \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w overthrew|strong="H2015"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*, \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0776"\w* shaketh \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w out|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* her \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* thereof \w tremble|strong="H7264"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0559"\w* commandeth tile sun \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* riseth \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H0559"\w* shutteth \w up|strong="H2856"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* as \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H3556"\w* under \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w seal|strong="H2856"\w*:

\w Who|strong="H1116"\w* \w alone|strong="H0905"\w* spreadeth \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* walketh \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w waves|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H6213"\w* maketh Arcturus, \w and|strong="H2315"\w* \w Orion|strong="H3685"\w*, \w and|strong="H2315"\w* Hyades, \w and|strong="H2315"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w inner|strong="H2315"\w* \w parts|strong="H2315"\w* \w of|strong="H2315"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w south|strong="H8486"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0369"\w* doth \w things|strong="H1419"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* incomprehensible, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w wonderful|strong="H6381"\w*, \w of|strong="H4557"\w* which \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2005"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* come \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w if|strong="H2005"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* depart \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H0995"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2005"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* examine \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H7725"\w* sudden, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*? \w or|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou \w so|strong="H6213"\w*?

\w God|strong="H0433"\w*, whose \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* mall \w can|strong="H3808"\w* resist, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* whom \w they|strong="H3808"\w* stoop \w that|strong="H3808"\w* bear up \w the|strong="H8478"\w* world.

\w What|strong="H1697"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w then|strong="H6030"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*?

\w I|strong="H0834"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w although|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w just|strong="H0834"\w* thing, \w would|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*, \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* make supplication \w to|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H0518"\w* \w hear|strong="H0238"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H0518"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* crush \w me|strong="H2600"\w* \w in|strong="H2600"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* whirlwind, \w and|strong="H0834"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w wounds|strong="H6482"\w* even \w without|strong="H2600"\w* \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* alloweth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* rest, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* filleth \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w bitterness|strong="H4472"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* be demanded, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* most \w strong|strong="H3581"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* equity \w of|strong="H4941"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w no|strong="H0518"\w* man dare bear witness \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w me|strong="H3259"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* would \w justify|strong="H6663"\w* \w myself|strong="H0589"\w*, \w my|strong="H0518"\w* own \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w shall|strong="H7561"\w* \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* would shew \w myself|strong="H0589"\w* \w innocent|strong="H6663"\w*, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H7561"\w* prove \w me|strong="H0589"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7561"\w*.

\w Although|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* should \w be|strong="H3808"\w* simple, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* ignorant \w of|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* weary \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w thing|strong="H0259"\w* there \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w*, \w both|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* innocent \w and|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* consumeth.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w scourge|strong="H7752"\w*, let \w him|strong="H4191"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w at|strong="H4191"\w* once, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w laugh|strong="H3932"\w* \w at|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* pains \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* covereth \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* thereof: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w then|strong="H0645"\w*?

\w My|strong="H7200"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w swifter|strong="H7043"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* post: \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w away|strong="H1272"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w passed|strong="H2498"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* as \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* carrying fruits, as \w an|strong="H5921"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* flying \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prey|strong="H0400"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0518"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w so|strong="H6440"\w*: \w I|strong="H0518"\w* change \w my|strong="H0518"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* am tormented \w with|strong="H6440"\w* sorrow.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* feared \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* works, \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou didst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* spare \w the|strong="H3605"\w* offender.

\w But|strong="H4100"\w* if \w so|strong="H2088"\w* \w also|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7561"\w*, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H0595"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* laboured \w in|strong="H2088"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*?

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* be \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* as \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w were|strong="H3709"\w* \w with|strong="H7364"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w* waters, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w my|strong="H0518"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* shall shine ever so clean:

\w Yet|strong="H0227"\w* thou shalt \w plunge|strong="H2881"\w* \w me|strong="H8581"\w* \w in|strong="H0227"\w* filth, \w and|strong="H8008"\w* \w my|strong="H0227"\w* \w garments|strong="H8008"\w* shall \w abhor|strong="H8581"\w* \w me|strong="H8581"\w*,

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* myself: \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H0935"\w* equally \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* none \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w may|strong="H3426"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w able|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H7896"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H7626"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w fear|strong="H0367"\w* \w terrify|strong="H1204"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w him|strong="H1696"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* answer \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*.
